about_the_game:
Thunderman: Adventures in Another Realm is an exhilarating 2D action-platformer where you embark on an epic journey alongside Kaelan, a young archer chosen as the defender of the universe. To restore peace, you must face dangerous enemies, gather resources to survive, and explore landscapes filled with challenges and mysteries.
Rack up points, climb the leaderboard, and prove your skills! Download Thunderman now and become the hero the universe needs!

About the Game
Relive the Golden Age of Action Games with Thunderman!Dive into an epic adventure that blends the charm of classic 2D action-platformers with a modern and captivating aesthetic. Featuring high-quality pixel art, delightful animations, and hand-drawn environments, Thunderman will awaken your nostalgia while putting your skills to the test.

Get ready to face relentless enemies, explore levels full of surprises, and battle breathtaking bosses!

✨ What’s on the Horizon:In February, Thunderman will receive new levels and even more incredible enemies, bringing fresh excitement to your journey. We’re hard at work on the full game, but in the meantime, you can follow our progress through regular updates and new content!

📢 Stay in the Loop!Add Thunderman to your wishlist on Steam and join our community. Your next big adventure starts here!

Gameplay

Action-Platformer with a Unique Survival Challenge!You only get one shot. In Thunderman, the adrenaline never stops: with just one life, every jump, every battle, and every resource you collect could mean the difference between success and defeat.

Explore stunning, danger-filled environments, take on relentless enemies, and fight epic bosses. But beware: reaching the end of this journey requires careful planning and resource management.

✨ A Challenge for the Bold:Thunderman blends the thrill of classic action-platformers with the strategic tension of survival. Are you ready to push your limits?

Story

Kaelan is a young warrior chosen to be the defender of the universe. He lives in a temporal rift connecting various worlds and realities, tasked with protecting order and preventing the forces of evil from consuming the cosmos. His life was peaceful until the awakening of a fearsome enemy: Volkran, the Shadow Weaver.

With his dark powers, Volkran casts a powerful spell, absorbing planet Earth into his shadowy realm. He plans to use the planet’s energy to expand his dominion and conquer other galaxies. To achieve this, he seeks legendary jewels hidden across different eras, capable of amplifying his powers.

Volkran's magic destabilizes space-time, causing Earth to oscillate between different ages and turning reality into chaos. Terrifying creatures emerge from these distortions, attempting to stop Kaelan from achieving his goal.

Now, Kaelan must traverse fragmented timelines, defeat Volkran, and recover the jewels, breaking the spell that threatens to plunge the universe into darkness. Only by braving the perils of each era and overcoming the challenges imposed by time can he have a chance to save the planet and restore balance.
